summary.description: A tool for predicting and analysing transcription factor binding sites | CIIIDER is a user-friendly tool for predicting and analysing transcription factor binding sites, designed with biologists in mind | Transcription factor binding site prediction and visualisation software | As of Oct 1, gitlab.erc and the underlying VM will be patched at ~8:00am on Tuesday mornings No down times are expected but performance may be degraded for an hour or so | BED file should save with BED extension.
